revision.text:
{{codepointer|Weapon|r=Hexen}}'''A_CStaffInitBlink'''
(no parameters)
Sets the calling actor's ''special1'' field to a random value between 20 and 275. Used in conjunction with [[A_CStaffCheckBlink]].
This codepointer is restricted to [[Classes:CWeapStaff|CWeapStaff]] and derived classes.
